subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The San Jose Sharks have come streaking into the playoffs, winning 18 of 21 games since Feb. 20. Only in the N.H.L. could this be perceived as a problem.
snippet: The San Jose Sharks have come streaking into the playoffs, winning 18 of 21 games since Feb. 20. Only in the N.H.L. could this be perceived as a problem.
